home.description: Welcome on the official page of "Create Your Ideas". Create your ideas is a plattform where users could share theyr ideas and where they have the possibilities to find an invester which support this idea. The whole project is created like a big virtual online business game. And its free for all.
home.unit: "Create Your Ideas" is a unit of the "Heartfull-Mind" online company
